SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.ATCH_FILE_ID, b.FILE_CN, b.FILE_SN, b.FILE_STRE_COURS, b.STRE_FILE_NM, b.FILE_EXTSN, b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, b.FILE_SIZE, a.CREAT_DT, a.FILE_ID, c.FILE_SIZE AS FILESIZE, c.FILE_UPLOAD_COUNT, c.FILE_PATH, c.FILE_URL, c.FILE_PREFIX, c.FILE_TYPE, c.FILE_WEB_DESC FROM LETTNFILE a, LETTNFILEDETAIL b,DM_UPLOAD_FILE_MASTER c WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID AND a.FILE_ID = c.FILE_ID AND a.USE_AT = 'Y'
AND b.STRE_FILE_NM LIKE '%${searchWrd}%'
AND b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM LIKE '%${searchWrd}%'
) TB ) TT WHERE rn BETWEEN #{firstIndex} + 1 AND #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage} ORDER BY ATCH_FILE_ID, FILE_SN

AND b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM LIKE '%${searchWrd}%'
